message: Roger, you just proved by opening your mouth your stupidity. Thank you for that.
He`s staying on the campaign trail for Killery & to heck with worrying about war is headed our way. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I truly believe that our Government is trying to divide us .Some might think it sounds crazy but if you divide the population you break it. Thus it is easier for those at the top to have greater control over all of us . Someday soon I believe we will come see the reality of this. United we stand divided we fall. This way how can the masses work together when Uncle Sam becomes totalitarian : a system of government that is centralized and dictatorial and requires complete subservience to the state. Sounds like what DC wants to do to us pawns.

Working fast food is stressful amd degrading and people know they cant stand for 10-12 hrs straight when they are fifty lmao. I never wanted to work fast food because its embarrassing and I wanted a career and to do something useful with my time. Doesn't mean those that do should get paid less than a true living wage.
Gun laws lol I want to see them.take these guns from the gangbangers

Probably the money that they saved from payroll by refusing to pay their workers a living wage... so that in addition to working they are still poor enough to qualify for public assistance... the result being that the rest of us taxpayers get to subsidize Wal-Mart's payroll . They also save money by refusing to have a large enough staff on duty to watch the floor and deter shoplifting... Meaning that in some cities as many as two officers pretty much spend their days dealing with crimes at Walmart... and the taxpayers pay for those police officers... Meaning that once again we are subsidizing Walmart's cost of doing business. Also... They save money by opening up all those self-serve registers so that they have fewer jobs to offer real people.
Democracy is more than you think.
What reason would he have to do so?

Some of these responses are unbelievable. Michelle Obama tried to start a good thing to nourish your kids. She can't police what each district puts in their lunches. You are all at choice. If your kids won't eat what's served, let them learn some life skills - make their own lunches at home and quit complaining. Geez!

Be interesting to see which person has decided to commit political suicide

Maxine Mcfarlane He could save her. He has a magnificent plan that you and I are not privy to this side of heaven. He may want her to be in heaven with Him now to save her the pain of something even more awful and painful later. I do not know, but I trust my God with my whole heart! I, Maxine, can say this with certainty. MY SON died suddenly in Dec. and I know there was a reason he was allowed to go. You see, I believe in the Bible. I believe God when he said our days were numbered before we were formed in our mothers' womb. You see God is omnipotent, omniscient and always has been. In His kind and generous love he gave us our last nine months with our grown son (even moving us from another state, finding a buyer for our farm and letting us live WITH him for 3 months while we found the right house). We were so Blessed to have this wonderful person in our life and now I know he is not suffering any of life's burdens. I do not know about this 14 year old girl. I do not know if her decision is the right one. That is between her and God. BUT I do know that God could save her! I know that if it is in HIS plan He will. But I also know He will not leave her. He has not abandoned her. He never has and never will. Amen.
